children: aññāṇahetu, saccapaṭicchādakasammohahetūti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ
ti ‘‘aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā’’tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni, pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā.
innerText: 607-661.Aññāṇāti aññāṇahetu, saccapaṭicchādakasammohahetūti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ ‘‘aññāṇenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Sabbānīti ‘‘aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā’’tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni, pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā.
